cons: The pay is not as high as you would get in the private sector, but given the benefits and work-life balance, you have to decide what is important.

job_title: Customer Success Manager in Guelph, ON
pros: Flex timing, great vacation package, good pension plan.
cons:
The CEO is a former employee of Blackberry who brought in her own team from Blackberry and reinstated them in upper management positions at OCAS. Nothing wrong in that.
However the rest of the employees who are not Blackberry alumni are stuck in a dead end job with no hope for any promotions and career advancements. The organization has become top heavy, with the employees at the lower end of the pecking order doing all the heavy lifting.
All the happy talk from upper management is nothing short of toxic positivity.
